mapper.select:
select t.id,t.business_id as businessId, t.price_min as priceMin, t.price_max as priceMax, t.commission, t.commission_cost as commissionCost, t.create_time as createTime, t.update_time as updateTime from t_commission t
and t.business_id = #{businessId}
mapper.update: update t_commission set commission = #{commission}, commission_cost = #{commissionCost}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t.id, t.name,t.card_id as cardId,m.card_name as cardName, t.referrer_id as referrerId, r.name_referrer as referrerName,t.create_time as createTime, t.update_time as updateTime from t_commission t left join t_card_management m on m.id = t.card_id left join t_referrer r on r.id = t.referrer_id WHERE t.id = #{id}
